name: The Wizard Party
description:
You awake, accidentally trapped in a surreal world because a bunch of wizards are having a party in the dream realm. Chat to peculiar and delightful characters, mix and combine ideas together to solve puzzles, and explore the dream realm as you try and free your soul by finding the host of, The Wizard Party!

  • Meet 35+ absurd animated characters! 🍄
  • Ask them about 50+ thoughts! 💭
  • 'ideas' interact to make new ones! 💡
  • Secret rooms and ending! 🔮
  • It's short, surreal and sweet! 🍬

Kia ora! I am Jack // nobones.
This is my second game and I am really proud of it. I brought in my skills as a 2D animator, love of making weird little creatures, and compulsion to fill things with silly jokes with lots of heart. Thank you for reading this far and I hope The Wizard Party brings you some joy!
